products.title: Day & Night Flecked Beige
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Burst Oyster Mushroom Vertical Blind
products.description: The burst oyster mushroom is the colour beige is trying to be. Rich yet modest, neutral toned but commanding respect, this blind has so much confidence that you could put it in any room of the house and it will be your favourite thing in each one. It will sit comfortably in any company of any colour, ideally in living spaces and or bathrooms for when you need to filter the light from entering your room.

products.title: Burst Beige Roller Blind
products.description: The burst beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The dimout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. These are their most popular dimout blinds and it's easy to see why - use this blind in your home to shade and give yourself privacy. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Gloss Beige Aluminium Venetian
products.description: If you're looking for a gloss beige aluminium venetian blind, look no more as this is the one for you. There isn't much more we can say about this silky, glossy beige aluminium slat other than how great it looks. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Amor Beige Roller Blind
products.description: The amor beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The blackout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. These are their most popular blackout blinds and it's easy to see why - use this blind in your bedroom to block out the early summer sun. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Sand Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Dorset Sand Roller Blind
products.description: With it's fun seaside themed pattern, the dorset sand roller blind is perfect for anyone living by the coast or who loves the beach. The seaside theme consists of all the usual suspects, like a lighthouse, lobster, starfish and the odd troublesome seagull. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor Beige With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor beige and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.
